meanings.sent1: The doctor identified the typhous symptoms in the patient.
meanings.sent2: The typhous outbreak spread quickly through the crowded city.
meanings.sent3: The typhous appearance of the old building made it seem eerie.
meanings.sent4: The typhous smell of decay filled the abandoned house.
meanings.sent5: The typhous rash was a clear sign of the disease.

meanings.definition: Caused by or relating to typhus.
meanings.sent1: Her typhous fever required immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent2: The typhous infection was traced back to contaminated water.
meanings.sent3: The typhous origin of the illness surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: His typhous delirium made him hallucinate strange things.
meanings.sent5: The typhous outbreak was contained with swift action.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to typhoid fever.
meanings.sent1: The typhous bacteria were found in the contaminated food.
meanings.sent2: Her typhous symptoms included high fever and stomach pain.
meanings.sent3: The typhous nature of the outbreak caused panic in the community.
meanings.sent4: The typhous fever spread rapidly among the crowded population.
meanings.sent5: The typhous epidemic was a major public health concern.
